devices.name: h2
cmds: tshark -i eth0 -w ../testing/results/pkts_output/sINT_real_output.pcapng -f "ip and udp and port 50000 and not icmp" -a duration:65 &

devices.name: h1
cmds: tshark -i eth0 -w ../testing/results/jitter_input/sINT_h1_real_output.pcapng -f "ether proto 0x6666 or (ip and udp and port 50000 and not icmp)" -a duration:65 &

devices.name: h3
cmds: tshark -i eth0 -w ../testing/results/jitter_input/sINT_h3_real_output.pcapng -f "ip and udp and port 50000 and not icmp" -a duration:65 &

devices.name: h4
cmds: tshark -i eth0 -w ../testing/results/jitter_input/sINT_h4_real_output.pcapng -f "ip and udp and port 50000 and not icmp" -a duration:65 &
